author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Atul Vani (see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3555) - OFBIZ-3555
On IE8 the description was not being displayed at all.
With Firefox it was working fine. After doing some research I ended up with this patch. Seem like 'textContent' doesn't work in IE.

author: hwright

(array): Replace JNIStringHolder() with two calls to GetStringUTFChars()
